extendedInfo.description: Percentage CalculatorStruggle working out percentages? Who doesn't!?Now you don't need to worry, with Percentage Calculator even the most complex calculations are a breeze!From basic percentages to figuring out how much 25% off that great skirt is in the sales, we've got you covered!There's even a tip calculator, so there's no arguing about how you are going to split the bill! This is 100% the best percentage calculator there is, download it today!

reviews.title: It\'s a billboard that adds!
reviews.comment: It\'s an app with advertising and no option to purchase, so it sucks...
reviews.author: Matt Micone
